com.versant.util
Class DateTimeConvert

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.util.DateTimeConvert

public class DateTimeConvert
extends java.lang.Object

Contains static utility functions for converting between VERSANT time and date formats (o_date, o_time, and o_timestamp) to Java time and date objects java.util.Date, java.sql.Date, java.sql.Time, and java.sql.Timestamp).

Method Detail

o_date_to_sql_Date

public static java.sql.Date o_date_to_sql_Date(int o_date)
Converts a VERSANT o_date to a java.sql.Date object.

Parameters:
o_date - An integer containing the number of days since January 1, 1970. If the o_date equals NULL_O_DATE, then this method returns null.

o_time_to_Time

public static java.sql.Time o_time_to_Time(int atime)
Converts a VERSANT o_time to a java.sql.Time object.

Parameters:
atime - An integer containing the number of milliseconds since midnight. If the o_time equals NULL_O_TIME, then this method returns null.

o_timestamp_to_Timestamp

public static java.sql.Timestamp o_timestamp_to_Timestamp(long o_timestamp)
Converts a VERSANT timestamp of type o_timestamp to a java.sql.Timestamp object.

Parameters:
o_timestamp - A long containing the number of nanoseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970. If the o_timestamp equals NULL_O_TIMESTAMP, then this method returns null.

o_timestamp_to_util_Date

public static java.util.Date o_timestamp_to_util_Date(long o_timestamp)
Converts a VERSANT o_timestamp to a java.util.Date object.

Parameters:
o_timestamp - A long containing the number of nanoseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970. If the o_timestamp equals NULL_O_TIMESTAMP, then this method returns null.

sql_Date_to_o_date

public static int sql_Date_to_o_date(java.sql.Date date)
Converts a java.sql.Date object to a VERSANT o_date.

Parameters:
date - A java.sql.Date object. If the Date object is set to null, returns NULL_O_DATE.

Time_to_o_time

public static int Time_to_o_time(java.sql.Time time)
Converts a java.sql.Time object to a VERSANT o_time.

Parameters:
time - A java.sql.Time object. If the Time object is set to null, returns NULL_O_TIME.

Timestamp_to_o_timestamp

public static long Timestamp_to_o_timestamp(java.sql.Timestamp timestamp)
Converts a java.sql.Timestamp object to a VERSANT o_timestamp.

Parameters:
timestamp - A java.sql.Timestamp object. If the Timestamp object is set to null, returns NULL_O_TIMESTAMP.

util_Date_to_o_timestamp

public static long util_Date_to_o_timestamp(java.util.Date date)
Converts a java.util.Date object to a VERSANT o_timestamp.

Parameters:
date - A java.util.Date object If the Date object is set to null, returns NULL_O_TIMESTAMP.
